feature.name: Warding Flare
feature.shortDescription: You can interpose divine light between yourself and an attacking enemy. When you are attacked by a creature within 30 feet of you that you can see, you can use your reaction to impose a disadvantage on the attack roll, causing light to flare before the attacker before it hits or misses. An attacker that can't be blinded is immune to this feature. You can use this feature a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of once). You regain all expended uses after a long rest.

action.name: Radiance of the Dawn
action.shortDescription: As an action, you can harness sunlight, banishing darkness and dealing radiant damage to your foes. As an action, you present your holy symbol and any magical darkness within 30 feet of you is dispelled. Additionally, each hostile creature within 30 feet of you must make a constitution saving throw. A create takes radiant damage equal to 2d10 + your cleric level on a failed saving throw, and half as much damage on a successful one. A creature with total cover from you is not affected.

feature.name: Warding Flare
feature.shortDescription: You can interpose divine light between an attacking enemy and yourself or another creature that you can see within 30 feet of you.. When you or another creature are attacked by a creature within 30 feet of you that you can see, you can use your reaction to impose a disadvantage on the attack roll, causing light to flare before the attacker before it hits or misses. An attacker that can't be blinded is immune to this feature. You can use this feature a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum of once). You regain all expended uses after a long rest.

feature.name: Potent Spellcasting
feature.shortDescription: You add your Wisdom Modifier to the damage you deal with any cleric cantrip.

feature.name: Corona of Light
feature.shortDescription: You can use your action to activate an aura of sunlight that lasts for 1 minute or until you dismiss it using another action.

effect.name: Corona of Light
effect.shortDescription: You emit bright light for 1 minute, or until you take an action to dismiss it, in a 60 foot radius and dim light 30 feet beyond that. Your enemies in the bright light have disadvantage on saving throws against any spell that deals fire or radiant damage.
